alert.note: Alert for Adams; Cumberland; Dauphin; Lancaster; York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 8:04PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHERN LANCASTER...NORTHEASTERN ADAMS...SOUTHERN DAUPHIN...CENTRAL YORK AND NORTHEASTERN CUMBERLAND COUNTIES THROUGH 830 PM EDT... At 804 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Mechanicsburg to Millersville. Movement was north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Lancaster, Harrisburg, York, Lower Allen, Hershey, Ephrata, Colonial Park, Weigelstown, Elizabethtown, Columbia, Progress, Lititz, Mechanicsburg, Middletown, Millersville, Camp Hill, Mount Joy, Palmyra, New Cumberland and Red Lion. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for south central Pennsylvania.
